introMessage:
Welcome to the Convex + Turborepo + Next.js Starter Setup!

This guide will help you configure your development environment with all the essential integrations for building modern full-stack applications.

steps.instructions:
This URL serves as the base URL for:
- Local development server
- Authentication callbacks
- API endpoints
Keep the default unless you have a custom port configuration.

steps.title: [32müîå Convex Setup[0m
steps.description: Configure your Convex backend for real-time features
instructions:
1. Visit [34mhttps://dashboard.convex.dev[0m to create your account
2. Create a new project:
   - Choose a project name
   - Select your preferred region
3. In your project dashboard:
   - Navigate to Settings > URL & Deploy Key
   - Copy your deployment URL
   - Example: [34mhttps://example-123.convex.cloud[0m
4. This URL enables:
   - Real-time data sync
   - Backend functions
   - Authentication
   - Database access

steps.title: [32müîë GitHub Authentication[0m
steps.description: Set up GitHub OAuth for user authentication
instructions:
1. Navigate to [34mhttps://github.com/settings/developers[0m
2. Click 'New OAuth App' to register
3. Configure your OAuth application:
   - Application Name: Your App Name
   - Homepage URL: [34mhttp://localhost:3000/[0m
   - Authorization callback URL (copy exactly): 
   - [34m{{convexSiteUrl}}/api/auth/callback/github[0m
4. After registration:
   - Save your Client ID
   - Generate and save your Client Secret
   [33m‚ö†Ô∏è  Keep these credentials secure and never commit them![0m

steps.title: [32müí≥ Polar Integration[0m
steps.description: Set up Polar for handling subscriptions and payments
instructions:
1. Create your Polar account at [34mhttps://polar.sh[0m
2. Configure your organization:
   - Select 'Sell with Polar'
   - For development: Use [34mhttps://sandbox.polar.sh/dashboard/create[0m
3. Set up your integration:
   - Organization ID: Find in Settings > General > Organization
   - Access Token: Generate in Settings > Developers (all permissions)
   - Webhook Configuration:
     ‚Ä¢ Webhook URL: [34m{{convexSiteUrl}}/payments/webhook[0m
     ‚Ä¢ Required Events: All subscription and payment events
     ‚Ä¢ Format: Select Raw
4. Create a subscription product:
   - Access [34mhttps://sandbox.polar.sh[0m
   - Go to Products > Catalogue > New Product
   - Configure your product:
     ‚Ä¢ Name: Your product name
     ‚Ä¢ Description: Product features
     ‚Ä¢ Pricing: Set your pricing tiers
     ‚Ä¢ Benefits: Add product benefits
   [33m‚ö†Ô∏è  Important: Create at least one product before continuing![0m
   Press Enter once you've set up your product.
5. This completes your payment integration setup
additionalInstructions: Note: Use sandbox mode for testing to avoid real transactions

steps.title: [32müìß Resend Email Service[0m
steps.description: Set up Resend for email authentication
instructions:
1. Create your account at [34mhttps://resend.com[0m
2. Set up API access:
   - Navigate to API Keys section
   - Generate a new API key (format: 're_...')
   [33m‚ö†Ô∏è  Store your API key securely[0m
3. Configure email sending:
   - Option 1: Add and verify your domain (recommended)
   - Option 2: Use sandbox domain for development
4. This enables:
   - OTP authentication
   - Email verification
